Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-all, python3-cartopy <!nocheck>, python3-matplotlib, python3-netcdf4 <!nocheck>, python3-numpy, python3-packaging <!nocheck>, python3-pandas, python3-pint, python3-pooch, python3-pyproj, python3-pytest <!nocheck>, python3-pytest-mpl <!nocheck>, python3-setuptools, python3-setuptools-scm, python3-shapely <!nocheck>, python3-scipy, python3-traitlets, python3-xarray
Description: Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations with we MetPy is a collection of tools in Python for reading, visualizing and performing calculations with weather data.
